name: vk_cl_drawdown
description: This table records the details of loan drawdowns for clients, including loan terms, client information, and transaction specifics.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date when the system processed this record.

columns.name: branch_no
columns.description: Identifier for the branch where the transaction occurred.

columns.name: vikki_client_no
columns.description: Unique identifier for the client in the Vikki system.

columns.name: client_no
columns.description: Unique identifier for the client in the system.

columns.name: client_name
columns.description: Name of the client or borrower.

columns.name: client_type
columns.description: Type or category of the client.

columns.name: gl_code
columns.description: Code for the general ledger account associated with the transaction.

columns.name: loan_no
columns.description: Unique identifier for the loan.

columns.name: loan_type
columns.description: Classification of the loan.

columns.name: loan_sub_type
columns.description: Further classification of the loan type.

columns.name: loan_sub_type_desc
columns.description: Description of the loan subtype.

columns.name: purpose
columns.description: Code indicating the purpose of the loan.

columns.name: purpose_desc
columns.description: Description of the loan's purpose.

columns.name: date_applied
columns.description: Date when the loan application was submitted.

columns.name: offer_expiry
columns.description: Date when the loan offer expires.

columns.name: maturity_date
columns.description: Date when the loan is due to be fully repaid.

columns.name: signed_date
columns.description: Date when the loan agreement was signed.

columns.name: int_rate
columns.description: Interest rate applied to the loan.

columns.name: start_date
columns.description: Date when the loan starts.

columns.name: review_date
columns.description: Date scheduled for reviewing the loan terms.

columns.name: auto_rec_gen
columns.description: Indicates if the record was generated automatically.

columns.name: billing_days
columns.description: Number of days in the billing cycle.

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: Identifier for the user who processed the transaction.

columns.name: verify
columns.description: Status indicating if the transaction was verified.

columns.name: verifier_id
columns.description: Identifier for the person who verified the transaction.

columns.name: verify_date
columns.description: Date when the transaction was verified.

columns.name: last_change_date
columns.description: Date when the record was last changed.

columns.name: int_appl_type
columns.description: Type of interest application for the loan.

columns.name: acct_exec
columns.description: Executive responsible for the account.

columns.name: profit_centre
columns.description: Business unit or division responsible for the profit.

columns.name: dd_no
columns.description: Unique identifier for the drawdown.

columns.name: dd_ccy
columns.description: Currency in which the drawdown is made.

columns.name: dd_date
columns.description: Date when the drawdown occurred.

columns.name: acct_no_dd
columns.description: Account number associated with the drawdown.

columns.name: dd_amt
columns.description: Amount of money disbursed in the drawdown.

columns.name: dd_amt_base
columns.description: Base currency amount of the drawdown.

columns.name: base_days
columns.description: Number of days used for base calculations.

columns.name: fixed_int_rate
columns.description: Fixed interest rate applied to the loan.

columns.name: pri_repay_type
columns.description: Type of principal repayment for the loan.

columns.name: pri_repay_freq
columns.description: Frequency of principal repayments.

columns.name: pri_repay_day
columns.description: Day of the month when principal is repaid.

columns.name: int_repay_freq
columns.description: Frequency of interest repayments.

columns.name: int_repay_day
columns.description: Day of the month when interest is repaid.

columns.name: roll_date
columns.description: Date when the loan is rolled over or renewed.

columns.name: roll_freq
columns.description: Frequency of loan rollovers.

columns.name: roll_day
columns.description: Day of the month for loan rollover.

columns.name: narrative
columns.description: Narrative or description of the transaction.

columns.name: org_amt
columns.description: Original amount of the loan.

columns.name: available_amt
columns.description: Amount available for drawdown.

columns.name: acct_no
columns.description: Account number associated with the transaction.

columns.name: posting_instructions_id
columns.description: Identifier for the posting instructions.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Type of event or transaction.

columns.name: transaction_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: btc_code
columns.description: Code for the business transaction category.

columns.name: opening_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction was opened.

columns.name: posting_value_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction was posted.

columns.name: dlh_created_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the DLH record was created.

columns.name: dlh_partition_date
columns.description: Date used for partitioning the DLH data.

columns.name: dlh_source
columns.description: Source of the DLH data.

columns.name: dlh_processed_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the DLH record was processed.

columns.name: year
columns.description: Year associated with the transaction.

columns.name: month
columns.description: Month associated with the transaction.

columns.name: day
columns.description: Day associated with the transaction.
